name: Nightmare (itch) (Chaotic Good Entertainment)
description:
You can't sleep. You feel like you're being watched. No matter what your parents say, the monster under your bed is real! Should you make a run for it? A sudden movement startles you. You jump out of bed and open your bedroom door. What you find is not the familiar corridor.  You're outside and it's pitch black. Only your heartbeat can light the path, but only for a moment. Can you escape the monster and end this nightmare?

Nightmare is an endless platformer under development. It's based upon an idea I once developed for the Global Game Jam many years ago.  Now determined to finally make a full game out of an idea I really liked, I present a first playable version of Nightmare!
